text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Starfield, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the HIDevolution ASUS ROG Zephyrus S GX531GW 15.6" FHD 144Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.2 GHz i7-8750H, RTX 2070 Max-Q, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, PCIe 512GB SSD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty. The battery life is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Avoid the HIDevolution ASUS ROG Zephyrus S GX531GW 15.6" FHD 144Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.2 GHz i7-8750H, RTX 2070 Max-Q, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, PCIe 512GB SSD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty if you can. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. Battery drains incredibly fast, even on light tasks.. Looking to return it.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the HIDevolution ASUS ROG Zephyrus S GX531GW 15.6" FHD 144Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.2 GHz i7-8750H, RTX 2070 Max-Q, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, PCIe 512GB SSD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty. It Wi-Fi drops intermittently frequently when playing Starfield, and the performance throttles significantly. The trackpad has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Cyberpunk 2077, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the HIDevolution ASUS ROG Zephyrus S GX531GW 15.6" FHD 144Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.2 GHz i7-8750H, RTX 2070 Max-Q, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, PCIe 512GB SSD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty. The fan noise is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

The HIDevolution ASUS ROG Zephyrus S GX531GW 15.6" FHD 144Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.2 GHz i7-8750H, RTX 2070 Max-Q, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, PCIe 512GB SSD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty does what it says on the tin. Good for streaming games, but the screen brightness could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.
